bobSnack.text:
Whew, am I BEAT!
*grumble*
And hungry!
I sure could go for a grilled cheese sandwich.
Guess I'll head home and grab a snack.

bobApproach.text:
'The CHX-2000: The #1 chainsaw ever made!
Includes 3 fairies for a boost in power.'
...


HOLD ON!
The fairies were
sent separately?
To the sky, water, and fire shrines.
Just what the heck is going on...

bossIntro.text:
Can't you see I'm busy!

You think it's EASY defending this forest?

N-no, sir. Not at all!

I-I just thought you should know... Bob... the CHX-2000...

GAH! No matter. I hacked his order!
That fool will never find all 3 fairies!
Hahahaha!

Hah... Y-yeah.
I guess you're right.

cloudFairy.text: Jeez, you sure know how to treat a lady!
It is kinda boring up here anyhow.
Cool if I bring along my comics and pop?

bossFirstFairy.text:
Hah,
this cat gif is pretty great.
He probably found the fairy by accident!
There's no way he'll find all three.
Close the door on your way out?

Hah... Y-yeah.
I guess you're right.

waterFairy.text: Ya'll come down to buy some of my seaweed?
Now that you mention it I AM kinda hungry...
But, no! I'm here to get YOU in MY chainsaw!
Your what now? You mean that doohickey?
Well, shucks, I suppose I could.
All I really do is sing to this seaweed anyhow.
I reckon it'll grow just fine without me.

bossSecondFairy.text: You know I like the lights off!
It makes me feel like a badass!
SIR! Bob has obtained the second fairy!
Aw, come on, it'll be fine.
Besides, I had a huge lunch.
Totally feel a nap coming on.
Get the lights on your way out, would ya?

fireFairy.text: You're holding a real work of art, pal!
Tell me about it! You want in?
With me in there she'll run like a dream!

bossLastFairy.text: I know, the new iFone model was announced!
I think it's too big, personally.
Though the attached selfie stick is cool.
No no no! It's Bob! He's found the last fairy!
What?! H-he has? Why didn't you warn me!

beforeLastBattle.text: I'm the last hope of the forest.
All that stands against the greed of man...

S-sir? When did you become
so poetic?
Huh, I was wondering what was in here.
Seems like some kinda sci-fi tree party?

afterLastBattleCont.text: No one meddles with my online activity!
Hah. Maybe we're not so different you and I...
We could have been Smilebook friends.
